column1: Art Institute of Chicago////One of the finest museums in America
column2: the Art Institute not only features iconic American works like Grant Wood's "American Gothic" and Edward Hopper's "Nighthawks
column3: but also has a world-class Impressionist collection featuring works from artists like Monet, Seurat, van Gogh, Picasso, and Degas, as well as collections from all over the world.
